籤詩版本二:
Chirimo chiri kuuya, maruva ari kutumbuka pavharanda, uye motokari dzinofamba zviuru zvemakiromita dziri kuunza pfuma.
Kana iwe ukawana iyo yechitatu level wave yeYumen, ichaita sekutinhira pasi
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra mufananidzo wekusangana namambo mudare.
Zvese zviri nyore.
解曰:
Mambo akagadzwa. Sepfuma inowanikwa muurombo. Tevera mwoyo wako. Yokutanga pakati pehexagrams.
Chiratidzo ichi chinotevera chido chemoyo wako. Zvose zvakanaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Mayuan matatu mubhizinesi
Shang Ren (1414-1486), zita rekuremekedza Hongzai, zita remadunhurirwa rekuti Suting, zita rekuti Wenyi, aive chizvarwa chekuChun'an, Zhejiang, China. Akazvarwa muna Kukadzi 25, gore regumi nemaviri raYongle muMing Dynasty.
Baba vake kana madzitateguru ake vakanga vasiri vakuru vakuru, asi aifarirwa nenyanzvi inonzi Wang Rui mumakore ake ekutanga.Mugore rechigumi raXuande muMing Dynasty (1435), akava pekutanga pabvunzo dzepurovhinzi (Xie Yuan). , akakundikana pabvunzo kakawanda, saka akazvipira kudzidza muTaixue, uye aidiwa zvikuru neImperial Academy. ), ndokuzoiswa pekutanga muPalace Examination (Zhuangyuan). MuMing Dynasty, Huang Guan chete uye iye, akadzingwa naZhu Di, aive nerukudzo urwu.
聖意: Rombo rakanaka mumba, rombo rakanaka, rombo rakanaka mubhizinesi, rombo rakanaka muwanano, kubudirira muLiujia, nhau dzakanaka kune vafambi, nhau dzakanaka muminda, makonye esirika, rombo rakanaka muzvipfuwo, kubudirira mukutsvaga vanhu, kudzoreredza, mhosva, kubudirira. , kutama, rombo rakanaka muzvinhu zvakarasika, kurwara, Anshan nemakuva
